snippet: Lopsided games and the playing of the College Football Playoff semifinals on New Year’s Eve for the first time led to a 13 percent drop in television ratings for the New Year’s Six bowls from last year.
abstract: ESPN reports that television ratings dropped 13 percent, as compared with previous year, for six major college football bowl games.
lead_paragraph: Lopsided games and the playing of the College Football Playoff semifinals on New Year’s Eve for the first time led to a 13 percent drop in television ratings for the New Year’s Six bowls from last year.

headline.main: Ratings Dip for Six Major Bowl Games
headline.print_headline: Ratings Dip for Six Major Bowl Games
